name: Truck Challenge
description:
(Go down to download the game! For more information, read below.)

Hi, I'm Uotsab Chakma! I'm a solo game developer!

'Truck Challenge' is a 3D android game made by me! Goal is to move the truck to a place with the boxes by which the player will win. There are 5 trucks and 20 maps.

This game is free game, however, the donating option is there! If you're confused about how to download the game, click download > take me to the download feed > download.

If you're having problems like can't buy a truck or unlock a map try my tips below:

1. If can't get enough money, move to main menu > shop > click the coins button to get 1000 coins!

2. If can't unlock a new level, try filling previous levels with 3 stars by watching an ad.

(Post a topic below if the game is too difficult!)

I didn't tested the game correctly. Because there are ads in this game and testing with real ads is against law as a game developer. But it dosen't means I wasn't able to test everything. I've tested game with testMode ads. If you get any problem with downloading, installing or playing the game, please post a topic below of this page about it. I'll try my best to help you!

I hope the game is fun to play. Enjoy!

(For more free games, visit Jumma Game Developer itch.io page! It's Uotsab Chakma!)
